topic.title: Slack Integration
topic.p: We love teams, and we want to help you collaborate even better than before!
With the Mingle + Slack integration, we bring to you the best of both collaboration tools. View cards, create cards, assign owners, post murmurs and more - all from Slack.
Your Mingle instance can be integrated with one Slack team. Each individual Mingle project may be linked with a Slack channel. Currently, a Slack channel may be linked with one Mingle project only.
topic.hint: This is available for Mingle on the Cloud only.
